products.title: Knightsbridge, Smoke - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a cool, neutral grey, with hints of beige, the knightsbridge in smoke offers a blank canvas for a number of decor and colour schemes. The linen-like fabric is lightweight, durable, and soft to the touch, making this blind both attractive and functional. Settle the beige mushroom smoke amidst soft, tonal blues to add a gentle neutral to tame the scheme. Together, the colours will form a coastal look, so add bleached woods and shabby chic furniture to complete the style.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: Just like its soft, lightweight, and linen-feel fabric, the light cream shade of the knightsbridge cream is simple and versatile. The finely woven cloth is highly durable, and is made even more so by their polycotton sateen lining, which backs all of their romans. Team the cream with soft aquas and pale taupes for a light and airy atmosphere in your guest bedroom or home study. You'll appreciate the calming influence yet will still be able to add colour with turquoises and golds.

products.title: Etched Vine, Sandstone - Roman Blind
products.description: On a sandy oatmeal base, the etched fern in sandstone displays intricately drawn florals in soft shades of white and charcoal, forming a delicate canvas of blossoms that will look pretty anywhere it's placed. Sit the sandstone against a deep chocolate feature wall, allowing the blind to offset the rich tone beautifully. Paint the remainder of the walls in a creamy white or barely there oatmeal, making for a cosy yet natural theme for a guest or master bedroom, or even a living room.

products.title: Maurice, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: Fashion a luxury dcor scheme using the maurice in cream, where a lavish combination of silky threads form an elegant blind with sumptuous texture, containing a nourishing cream shade to create opulent style with a comforting and welcoming fabric. Form a grand and eye-catching theme by combining the plush cloth of the cream with alike textured materials and soft furnishings in a soothing traditional palette of cream, taupe, and gold.

products.title: Shine, Ivory - Day Night Blind
products.description: Dreamy and romantic, the shine in ivory is a delicate and airy blind, displaying a soft, light-catching shimmer for texture and character. The fabric itself is sturdy and durable, yet still retains a lightweight and touchable feel, forming the perfect balance of substance and style. The ivory will look simply stunning as a lighter accent to a modern monochrome scheme. Settle against a dark slate feature wall for maximum impact and furnish the room with modern black and white furniture, accenting with shimmering greys and silvers.

products.title: Milky Way Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: The milky way range has a wonderful star pattern that will add something different to your dcor. The soft fabric of the milky way ivory roman blind is ideal for bedroom, however, can be used in other rooms. Product id: db-arom0836 fabric colour: ivory material: 100% cotton headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes milky way ivory roman blind in cream.

products.title: Basketweave, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: The relaxed yet plush cloth used for the basketweave cream is both attractive and functional. The thick, chenille-esque material produces a warm and cosy blind, whilst the criss-cross weave gives off provides a deep and textured finish. Ideal for adding a neutral, tempering tone to a luxe dining room, this blind is best combined with stronger and bolder shades. Try it with a deep forest green, adding hits of lime for colour and modernity, or with a plum purple shade, accented by pretty lilacs.

products.title: Vogue, Cream - Day Night Blind
products.description: The subtle off-white of the vogue offers a clean and contemporary aesthetic without the starkness of pure white, making it ideal for those looking for a slightly softer or warmer feel. The fabric is smooth to the touch, making for a streamlined look and easy handling. Settle the cream amidst an autumnal colour scheme in the kitchen, pairing it with burnt oranges and fellow creams. Add plenty of bold, leafy patterns for depth and contrast, and include dark woods to enhance the feeling of warmth.

products.title: Lottie Linen Curtain
products.description: The lottie linen curtain is decorated with a detailed repeating pattern of fern leaves in a woven jacquard texture a design that will bring a touch of natural charm to a host of home styles. The light linen colourway is ideal for blending with any decor and for maintaining a fresh and bright look for years to come. Product id: db-cur1180 fabric colour: linen material: 75% polyester 25% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes lottie linen curtain in cream.

products.title: Harper Linen Curtain
products.description: Their harper range comes in several soft, almost metallic, shades with a light leafy, fern pattern. Product id: db-cur1070 fabric colour: linen material: 54% polyester / 46% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes harper linen curtain in cream. Made to measure from 32.

products.title: Geometric Metallic Cream Curtain
products.description: A fantastic neutral, this textured geometric fabric is simple yet effective at creative depth, whilst adding a soft pop of colour to your home. Your new geometric metallic cream curtain,blends a warm cream shade with interwoven reflective silver threadwork to help create a modern, inspiring final look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtaincomes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Windsor, Sandstone - Roman Blind
products.description: A gently shimmering pale gold, emphasised by the satin-feel fabric, the windsor sandstone is a blind of class and elegance. The silky cloth works wonderfully as a roman blind, easily falling into folds, and complementing the gentle curves. Craft a look of understated glamour in your living room by grouping the sandstone with cream walls and soft furnishings, wood-look tongue and groove flooring, and brushed gold oddments and accessories.

products.title: Windsor, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: A sweet and sumptuous blind, mixing contrasting feelings of purity and grandeur, the windsor ivory incorporates pale, luxurious white and blends it with a silky smooth, lightweight fabric, all falling together into the gentle curves of the roman style. Keep your bedroom light and airy, with a touch of luxe, by hanging the ivory amongst pale pink or mint green walls, and accenting throughout the room with a darker version of your chosen colour.

products.title: Nightshade, Blue Grey Grain - Day Night Blind
products.description: With its beautifully textured look, in blueish slate and delicate silver, the nightshade blue grey grain is contemporary, stylish, and unusual. Add to this the hidden controls, sleek rail cassette, and sliding strips for light and privacy control, and you have the ultimate luxury blind. Treat the blue grey grain as a standalone window feature, setting it against pure white walls in the kitchen. Stick to white for the tiling and choose chrome units, accenting throughout with matching greys and whites for the most modernly chic look.

products.title: Morrison, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: Form a contemporary look with the eye-catching pattern and alluring shades of the morrison in dove, where a grouping of slate and dove greys create a distinctive and imaginative print on a nimble and relaxed cloth for chic style with little effort. Combine the soothing tones of the dove with a similar base of subdued grey or white, accenting the striking print with alike designs and contrasting charcoal oddments.

products.title: Dragonfly Linen Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This linen dragonfly curtain, in a soft cream colour, makes this muted curtain a must for insect and neutral lovers. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly linen curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Linen Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary shades. Classic traditional design, on a creamy linen blue background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee linen curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Ivory Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary, soft hues. Classic traditional design, on a soft off-white ivory background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee ivory curtain is suitable.

products.title: Artichoke Linen Curtain
products.description: Their artichoke curtain, inspired by the favourite european vegetable, blends reds and greens together on a light cream linen background to create a classic pattern with a modern twist. Perfect for adding flair to a kitchen or dining room. A cotton/linen blend fabric, makes this curtain breathable and light - wonderful for temperature regulation. Not only is this curtain made in yorkshire by us, we also offer a fantastic five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Splash Oyster - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash oyster light filtering skylight blind is a very light, natural cream colour perfect for a skylight window. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout Cream Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: Their unilux pvc blackout roof blinds come in their most popular colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. This flame retardant fabric has an fibreglass core and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction. Product id: db-srb0033 fabric colour: cream material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes unilux pvc blackout cream velux keylite fakro dakstra in cream.

products.title: Xerxes, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: The unique xerxes ivory features an array of creatures in browns, biscuits, and teals, all on a patterned background of cream and matte gold. The look is absolutely inspired and, of course, unusual, so you can be sure of this attractive roman blind being a real conversation piece. Bring out the teal tone of the blind by making it your dining room's key colour. Go for a feature wall of teal, opting for creamy white on the rest of the walls.

products.title: Astral, Ivory - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a closer look at astral ivory and you come to appreciate the subtle way in which the leaves twist and turn across the fabric. They have an elegant and timeless feel to them - one which will add depth and clarity to your decor like never before. If you want to introduce a spark of creative inspiration to the dining room, combine ivory with some dark tableware and wall art to provide a strong contrast.

products.title: Origin, Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Give your home a touch of the crisp modern aesthetic with origin cream. A finely woven voile serves as the perfect companion for the rich creamy fabric which sits underneath and allows you to subtly adjust the light levels to frame your room exactly how the occasion requires. Cream adds a homely quality to your decor that allows you to introduce anything from a light washed out blue to a gentle stone grey as you craft a relaxing atmosphere to savour.

products.title: Marseille Smoke Roman Blind
products.description: Their marseille range is a set of wonderful roman blinds in soft colours that will give the room a unique look. This beautiful grey roman blind with a nice texture will add a touch of elegance to your room. Product id: db-arom0834 fabric colour: smoke material: 54% viscose 46% polyester headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes marseille smoke roman blind in grey.

products.title: Feather, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty, neutral patterning of the feather in dove showcases an understated style of dcor that will look at home in any kind of setting. Combining a pale creamy oatmeal background with a neutral grey for the illustrations, the look is subtle yet powerful. Surround the dove with alike cool neutrals, including soft cream walls, and pale grey tones to accentuate the light and airy look of the blind.

products.title: Splash Smoke Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash smoke blue perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this medium blue perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Pearl Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Choose pearl splash to introduce elegant creams tones into your space. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Oyster Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash a bit of money on their splash range, this beautiful and elegant range comes in 12 different colours, a beautiful addition to any room. Splash oyster is a warm cream colour, perfect for your living rooms all year around. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous light cream blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Genesis Cream Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This cream perfect fit roller blind is ideal for any room in your home due to the neutral tone of the fabric. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws. products.title: Nightshade, Brown Grain - Day Night Blind
products.description: Who knew that neat, intricate stitching could offer such a delightful wood look? The nightshade in brown grain does just that, with chocolate and taupe threads forming a textured aesthetic and working perfectly with the translucent netting that slides between them for flexible light and privacy. Due to the wood-effect fabric, the brown grain will match any number of dcor schemes. Why not embrace the brown and pair with matching chocolate tones and a vibrant lime green? This look would work fantastically in a garden-view living room to match the colours of the outdoors.

products.title: Wonderland, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous wonderland cream takes a rich cream background and charms it with pink and golden tones, leaving us with a beautifully antiqued look and feel to this roman blind. It's absolutely perfect for a home with a vintage style, whether traditional or contemporary. The cream will look fantastic in a master bedroom, placed amongst luxe creams and plush fabrics. Pick out the pink tone in the blind to use as an accent colour, keeping the remainder of the room neutral yet luxurious.

products.title: Rift Softshade Magnolia Cream Day And Night Blind
products.description: Add the finishing touch to a clean and contemporary interior with the rift softshade magnolia cream day and night roller blind. This blind makes creating optimum light levels in your home super easy. The practical design of natural cream fabric panels with translucent voile strips in-between enables you to gain a sense of privacy with partial shading - perfect for making the most of natural light.

products.title: Leonardo, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: The intricate, traditional patterning of the leonardo in dove is beautifully accentuated by the soft silver colouring. Ranging from barely there grey to gunmetal charcoal, the colour combination is just beautiful and, combined with the pretty stitching, makes quite a statement. Add the dove to your living room to create a truly luxurious look. Go for soft white walls and grey carpeting, and include silvery grey sofas and chairs.

products.title: Nova, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: The deep grey of the nova dove provides a neutral backdrop to a subtle arrowed patterning on this luxury feel curtain. The high quality fabric is available lined or unlined, so that you can use it as a blackout blind if you wish. Use the dove as part of a contemporary monochromatic colour scheme that can be complemented by splashes of yellow, orange, or lime for a cool and funky living room or dining room that will be the envy of all of your friends.

products.title: Highbury, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: Sleek and shimmering in soft silver, ivory white, and deep shades of grey, the highbury dove is a calm, gentle, and subtly glamorous blind. The heavily layered fabric is gently woven with careful stitching, and folds neatly into the soft, curving arches of the roman style. Opt for monochromatic chic in a contemporary guest bedroom by sitting the dove against matching ivory walls. Choose silver-lined grey bedlinen, incorporating the darker shades of slate and charcoal grey in accessories, frames, and ornaments.

products.title: Soho, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: A softly cornered geometric-style arrangement takes centre stage in the grey and taupe soho dove, which incorporates a range of stitching patterns, both simple and complex, giving it a deep and interesting textured look to add character to its pale palette. Calm your home office by treating it to the tranquil orderliness of the dove, which will look simple yet striking against ivory white walls in a room flecked with furnishings and accessories in slate greys, stone whites, and metallic silvers.

products.title: Splash Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash dove grey panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The light grey panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Smoke Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash smoke blue panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This saturated, medium blue dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Splash cream panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The light cream fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. At swift direct blinds, like all their made to measure products, these panel blinds are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Spun Pearl - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).
